data.actual_result: The whole debug screen scrolls you down when new debug status messages come
data.expected_result: The debug screen should remain at where you're reading
data.short_description: In Debugging while scrolling/looking all the way up, when new debug messages are being written by, it scrolls down agressively even while at the top where it says "application initialized"
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Debugging (or debug as it says) - scroll up and wait untill new debugging status messages appear - look how the debugging new status messages appear and make the screen scroll all the way down
